element.label: Member OU
element.name: discover_office_hierarchy

element.label: OU Process Template Creator: User can create/update/delete OU processes?
element.name: has_ou_process_rights

element.label: Personal Process Template Creator: User can create/update/delete Personal proces
element.name: has_personal_process_rights

element.hint:
Task Management: This is the Global Tasking Authority Role.
- Manage assignment of Taskers to any user in any OU. - Enable other users to be Tasking Authorities for an OU. - Manage Members in all OUs. - Reviews and approves Suggested Tasks - Manage Members in all OUS.
This is a powerful, restricted role.
element.label: User is Global Tasking Authority?
element.name: is_global_tasking_authority

element.label: OU Hierarchy Administrator: User can add/update/delete only Sub OUs & Members?
element.name: is_office_administrator

element.label: Member User
element.name: office_member

element.label: Global Hierarchy Administrator: User can add/update/delete OUs/Sub OUs & Members
element.name: user_is_organization_admin
